      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Handles everything on master-side related to master election.

      Tracks the list of draining region servers via ZK.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication中ZKListener的使用

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  HBaseReplicationEndpoint.PeerRegionServerListener
      Tracks changes to the list of region servers in a peer's cluster.
      class  ReplicationTrackerZKImpl.OtherRegionServerWatcher
      Watcher used to be notified of the other region server's death in the local cluster.

    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中ZKListener的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中ZKListener的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClusterStatusTracker
      Tracker on cluster settings up in zookeeper.
      class  DeletionListener
      A ZooKeeper watcher meant to detect deletions of ZNodes.
      class  LoadBalancerTracker
      Tracks the load balancer state up in ZK
      class  MasterAddressTracker
      Manages the location of the current active Master for the RegionServer.
      class  MasterMaintenanceModeTracker
      Tracks the master Maintenance Mode via ZK.
      class  RegionNormalizerTracker
      Tracks region normalizer state up in ZK
      class  ZKLeaderManager
      已过时。 
      Not used
      class  ZKNodeTracker
      Tracks the availability and value of a single ZooKeeper node.
      返回变量类型为ZKListener的类型的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<ZKListener> ZKWatcher.getListeners()
      Get a copy of current registered listeners
      参数类型为ZKListener的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.zookeeper中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ZKWatcher.registerListener(ZKListener listener)
      Register the specified listener to receive ZooKeeper events.
      void ZKWatcher.registerListenerFirst(ZKListener listener)
      Register the specified listener to receive ZooKeeper events and add it as the first in the list of current listeners.
      void ZKWatcher.unregisterListener(ZKListener listener)
